last_episode_to_air.overview: With everyone's support, Jim sets his plan in motion to bait the Swarm. All seems to go well until Howard goes rogue.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8

name: MAKE MY DAY
overview: On an isolated icy planet promising a bright future, prisoners are forced to excavate a rare energy source that leads to a deadly, unwelcome discovery.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The snowy, ice-covered planet Coldfoot is home to a precious energy-rich ore called “sig.” On the surface, the planet seems to be a crime-free utopia, but in reality prisoners are used for back-breaking sig mining. Jim, a young prison guard, rushes to the site of a sudden mining accident to find a mysterious creature attacking the humans.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Jim prepares for another day at work as a guard at White Prison. During his commute, he notices that something is off.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As Jim scavenges through broken pieces of equipment, Walter reluctantly lends a hand. They manage to signal for help but must escape discreetly.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jim has a flashback to his childhood self with Ed and Marnie. Back in reality, an unlikely ally rescues him from the rubble.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Devastated by the horrendous sight, Jim rushes to save Ed. But they are no match against the deadly beast.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ambushed while using the restroom, Jim regains consciousness behind bars. Worried about Marnie, he must think on his feet.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After Dr. Hadson blacks out, Marnie attempts to take over the navigation. Meanwhile, Boyd and Rachel provide vital information regarding the Swarm.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: All hope is lost, but nature doesn’t wait — Marnie goes into labor. Walter reveals the truth about his dark past.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: With everyone's support, Jim sets his plan in motion to bait the Swarm. All seems to go well until Howard goes rogue.

Jim, a young prison guard, rushes to the site of a sudden mining accident to find a mysterious creature attacking the humans.
